original_title: OMG...It's The Leaving Las Vegas XXX Parody
overview: An alcoholic that lost everything decides to go to Las Vegas to spend his last days. In unexpected circumstances, he literally runs into a prostitute that is just as sad and lonely as himself. The two begin a strange relationship based on codependency. Can a drunk and a whore find true love in the city of sin? Stranger things have happened in Vegas.
tagline: OMG...It's The Leaving Las Vegas XXX Parody
title: OMG...It's The Leaving Las Vegas XXX Parody
